channel.title: Deep Learning on teleported.in
channel.description: Recent content in Deep Learning on teleported.in

item.title: Decoding the ResNet architecture
item.description: Introduction Fast.ai’s 2017 batch kicked off on 30th Oct and introduced us participants to the ResNet model in the first lecture itself. I had used this model earlier in the passing but got curious to dig into its architecture this time. (In fact in one of my earlier client projects I had used Faster RCNN, which uses a ResNet variant under the hood.) ResNet was unleashed in 2015 by Kaiming He.
